thread.title: Kate Upton Accuses Guess Co-Founder Paul Marciano of Abusing Women

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: Kate Upton Accuses Guess Co-Founder Paul Marciano of Abusing Women
text:
Model and actress Kate Upton has accused Guess? Inc. co-founder Paul Marciano of using his power in the industry to abuse women.
In a tweet posted Wednesday afternoon, Ms. Upton wrote, “It’s disappointing that such an iconic women’s brand @Guess is still empowering Paul Marciano as their creative director #metoo.”
Soon after, Ms. Upton, 25...
